text_126.en: A Slider in mobile UI design is a user interface element that allows users to select a value from a range by dragging a thumb along a track. In Material Design, sliders have a consistent appearance with a thumb and track, offering a visually intuitive way to input and adjust numerical values within a specified range.

text_127.en: The default range is 0 to 100. However, you can set restrictions on what numbers are accepted with the min, max, steps and even marks.

text_130.en: Add a slider into your app using the `addSlider` method like this:

text_139.en: Here are the available setters and getter of the Slider Component.

text_189.en: Here are the methods available for Slider Component.

text_191.en: Adds an event handler when the Slider component is touch.

text_195.en: Sets a callback function when the value of the Slider Component changes.

text_199.en: Sets a callback function when a final value is selected. This is equal to submit value event.

text_203.en: Sets a range value for the Slider Component.

text_208.en: Sets the marks of the Slider Component.

text_211.en: If value is `Boolean` the marks is base on the step.

text_212.en: If the value is `Array`, the elements must be an object of the form `{ label, value }` where `label` is a string and `value` is a number within the range.

text_215.en: Returns the step marks of the Slider Component. See `setMarks` methods for possible values.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
